description: A room within Arlong Park where Nami was forced to draw maps for Arlong's conquest plans. The walls are covered with maps that Nami spent eight years creating. Her desk contains a pen encrusted with her blood, symbolizing the brutal toll of her forced labor.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Discovers Nami's Cartography Room
keyEvents.description: Arlong slams Luffy through the wall into Nami's cartography room where Luffy sees the evidence of her eight years of suffering.
keyEvents.significance: This discovery reveals the true extent of Nami's exploitation and strengthens Luffy's resolve to free her.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Declares Nami as His Navigator
keyEvents.description: Standing in this room, Luffy formally declares Nami as his navigator.
keyEvents.significance: The room becomes the setting for one of the most important crew declarations in the series.

statusHistory.reason: Room is in active use by Arlong to exploit Nami

description: The headquarters of the Arlong Pirates, a large fortress-like structure where Arlong conducts his operations and exploits the local population.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Arlong Battle
keyEvents.description: The intense battle between Luffy and Arlong takes place throughout Arlong Park.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic location for the resolution of the Arlong Park arc.
